mapper.insert: insert into rank (rank, productnum, productprice, productsum, createtime, updatetime) values (#{rank}, #{productNum}, #{productPrice}, #{productSum}, #{createtime}, #{updatetime});
mapper.update: update rank set productnum = #{productNum}, productprice = #{productPrice}, productsum = #{productSum}, updatetime = #{updatetime} where rank = #{rank};
mapper.select: select count(id) from rank where rank = #{rank};
select * from rank where rank like #{rank};
